name: KEN
description:
Search for clues on where everyone is in this challenging, post-apocalyptic 2D platformer. Play as the sentient being KEN and find your way through the world picking up notes left behind by a mysterious man along the way. Don't get caught by the spikes.

This is the first game I have ever made

It is challenging 

It is unbeaten

It is "Impossible"

Have fun

Made by Jared Caldeiro / Spheeg

If there are any issues or you want to ask a question email me at:

spheeggames@gmail.com
